description: Sheryl Crow kicked off the first Democrat presidential debate Tuesday night by leading the candidates and the audience in a rendition of the National Anthem.
title: Watch: Sheryl Crow Struggles Through National Anthem at Democrat Debate
title_page: Watch: Sheryl Crow Struggles Through National Anthem at Democrat Debate | Breitbart
text:
Sheryl Crow kicked off the first Democrat presidential debate Tuesday night by leading the candidates and the audience in a rendition of the National Anthem.
Sen. Bernie Sanders and former Maryland Gov. Martin Oâ€™Malley sang along as Crow performed.
Check out the video here (National Anthem starts around the 2:25 mark)
@whatkylasaid Seriously!! Sheryl Crow has been a professional singer long enough to know better. That was bloody painful. #DemDebate â€” Shera Starr Oliveria (@starr_rakh) October 14, 2015
So far the best part of #DemDebate was @SherylCrow 's awful signing. Even @realDonaldTrump live tweeting can't save this snoozfest. â€” jennifer tashenberg (@jenntashenberg) October 14, 2015
Let's get Sheryl Crow back out here. #DemocraticDebate â€” Har Mar Superstar (@HarMarSuperstar) October 14, 2015

I hate to nit-pick, but wow did Sheryl Crow butcher the national anthem. ðŸ˜– â€” Sari Nelson (@KayleeTonks) October 14, 2015
